text: Read my 8 Principles on the Iran nuclear negotiations.http://www.wsj.com/articles/much-more-is-needed-to-stop-iran-from-getting-the-bomb-1431899619 …

html: #8. Certification by the president Iran changed its aggressive behavior & no longer qualifies as a designated state sponsor of terrorism.
text: #8. Certification by the president Iran changed its aggressive behavior & no longer qualifies as a designated state sponsor of terrorism.

html: #7. Removal of all enriched uranium from Iran. No need for Iran to possess a large stockpile of low enriched or any highly enriched uranium.
text: #7. Removal of all enriched uranium from Iran. No need for Iran to possess a large stockpile of low enriched or any highly enriched uranium.

html: #6. Iran must NOT be allowed to conduct research and development on advanced centrifuges.
text: #6. Iran must NOT be allowed to conduct research and development on advanced centrifuges.

html: #5. There must be an explicit process for the 'snapback' re-imposition of sanctions if Iran violates the deal.
text: #5. There must be an explicit process for the 'snapback' re-imposition of sanctions if Iran violates the deal.

html: #4. Sanctions relief/access to funds be phased in & fully conditioned on IAEA certification Iran in full & sustained compliance.
text: #4. Sanctions relief/access to funds be phased in & fully conditioned on IAEA certification Iran in full & sustained compliance.

html: #3. Anytime, anywhere inspections of all Iranian military and nonmilitary facilities.
text: #3.  Anytime, anywhere inspections of all Iranian military and nonmilitary facilities.

html: #2. Closure of all hardened and formerly secret sites. Iran must come clean on all outstanding issues raised by the IAEA.
text: #2. Closure of all hardened and formerly secret sites. Iran must come clean on all outstanding issues raised by the IAEA.

html: #1. Iran must not be allowed an enrichment capability greater than the practical needs to supply one commercial reactor.
text: #1. Iran must not be allowed an enrichment capability greater than the practical needs to supply one commercial reactor.

html: My 8 Principles to ensure we get the right answers and achieve a sound, enforceable deal regarding Iran's nuclear program.
